comment: The app is simple and works, but the refresh rate seems laggy. Other than that, it is a good app.
title: It Works

author: Jeb Ware
comment: Simple and gets the job done. I'd prefer a larger digital readout, though, for easier reading while biking.

reply.author: Oleksiy Martynov
reply.content: I am considering that change for the next update. Thank you for your input.

title: Straightforward

author: Daniel Gunitskiy
comment: It crashed my moto and it would never work.  Just a waste.  Don't fall for it.
title: Won't work

author: Dan Baer
comment: This will not work with my moto 360

author: Potatoe Coder
comment: Looks good on my watch and works flawlessly. Used it during a bicycle ride,

reply.author: Oleksiy Martynov
reply.content: I am happy to hear that.

title: Awesome

author: Ellen H
comment: Especially when I'm jogging and biking! Thanks :>

reply.author: Oleksiy Martynov
reply.content: No problem. I am glad that you are enjoying the app!

title: Useful app!
